data.event: Before its incorporation in 1855, the small community was known as both Fair View and Hog-Eye.

event.title: was burned to the ground on May 23, 1863

data.event: The entire town of Nevada was burned to the ground on May 23, 1863, by pro-Union militiamen from nearby Cedar County.

event.title: A few days before that, a small force of Union militia from Cedar County had attacked

data.event: A few days before that, a small force of Union militia from Cedar County had attacked the Nevada Courthouse.
